The thing is that teleporting often leads to superpoweful chars that can 
never be hit (I'd know, Zardus used to have that ability, and it made him 
almost impossible to hit. Untill I got rid of it). That's why I think 
teleportation should take alot of energy, or else we'll have invincible bots 
teleporting around the battlefield.
